# AttributedString.AttributeMergePolicy.keepNew

**Case**

A policy to keep the newly-merged attribute value when merging multiple sets of attributes.

## Declaration

```swift
case keepNew
```

## Merge Policies

- **AttributedString.AttributeMergePolicy.keepCurrent**: A policy to keep the string’s current attribute value when merging multiple sets of attributes.
